DataElement.preferredName: Adverse Event Etiology Reporting Attribution Name
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a name of an authorized group or person reporting the association between a cause of an adverse event and its attribution.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the authorized group or individual reporting the association between a cause of an adverse event and its attribution.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any unfavorable and unintended sign (including an abnormal laboratory finding), symptom, syndrome, or disease, temporally associated with the use of a medical product or procedure, regardless of whether or not it is considered related to the product or procedure (attribution of unrelated, unlikely, possible, probable, or definite). The concept refers to events that could be medical product related, dose related, route related, patient related, caused by an interaction with another therapy or procedure, or caused by opioid initiation or dose escalation. The term also is referred to as an adverse experience. The old term Side Effect is retired and should not be used.:process of identifying the cause of a particular disease or disorder.

Concepts.definition: Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).
process of identifying the cause of a particular disease or disorder.

Property.preferredDefinition: The act of providing a short account.:assigning to a cause or source.

Concepts.definition: The act of providing a short account.
To assign to a cause or source.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Adverse Drug Experience Report Reporting Identifier Name
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a name of an authorized group or individual reporting data to the Adverse Drug Experience Expedited Reporting System (AdEERS).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A language unit by which a person or thing is known.

Concepts.definition: A word or group of words indicating the identity of a person usually consisting of a first (personal) name and a last (family) name with an optional middle name. In some cultural traditions the family name comes first.

DataElement.origin: ADEERS:NCI/CTEP Adverse Event Expedited Report System
